Activity: Arrive at work, log into the computer, check emails, and spend some time searching for photography portfolios online.
Review patient schedule and prepare for the day's assessments and vaccinations. Ensure all necessary supplies and equipment are readily available.
Focus on patients who are at high risk for influenza complications, such as elderly patients or those with chronic conditions. Prioritize their assessments and vaccinations.
Document assessment findings and vaccination details in the EHR, ensuring accuracy and completeness. Pay special attention to any adverse reactions or complications.
Collaborate with @rn-2 on a complex patient case involving multiple comorbidities. Discuss the optimal approach for assessment and vaccination. @PEOPLE [rn-2], Topic: Complex Patient Case Discussion.
Continue with patient assessments, influenza vaccinations, and meticulous EHR documentation. Address any patient questions or concerns with empathy and clarity.
Contact @itpm-1 to report a minor technical issue I encountered while entering data into the EHR. @PEOPLE [itpm-1], Topic: EHR Technical Issue Report.
Prepare end-of-day report of the work progress and create a to-do list for tomorrow.
Check and respond to the emails.
